heading: HR00421
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE ALLEGED RIOT AT THE NEW BILIBID PRISON THAT CLAIMED THE LIFE OF A HIGH-PROFILE INMATE AND INJURING FOUR OTHERS WITH THE END IN VIEW OF PROPOSING REMEDIAL LEGISLATION TO ADDRESS THE SECURITY AND SAFETY IN OUR PRISON FACILITIES
principal-authors: ALEJANO, GARY C.; BAGUILAT, TEDDY JR. BRAWNER; BILLONES, EMMANUEL A.; DAZA, RAUL A.; LAGMAN, EDCEL C.; VILLARIN, TOM S.;
status: Pending with the Committee on JUSTICE since 2016-10-19
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00421
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE ALLEGED RIOT AT THE NEW BILIBID PRISON THAT CLAIMED THE LIFE OF A HIGH-PROFILE INMATE AND INJURING FOUR OTHERS WITH THE END IN VIEW OF PROPOSING REMEDIAL LEGISLATION TO ADDRESS THE SECURITY AND SAFETY IN OUR PRISON FACILITIES
